data.text:
The day of the mock race……More spectators had come 
than I expected. And not just Narita Top Road's friends――
data.processed:
<story>The day of the mock race……More spectators had come 
<story>than I expected. And not just Narita Top Road's friends――

data.text:
Let's see, how did training go……Oh? Looking a little nervous? 
Well, it's your first race as a pro trainer after all.
data.name: Sensei
data.processed:
<story>Let's see, how did training go……Oh? Looking a little nervous? 
<story>Well, it's your first race as a pro trainer after all.

data.text:
Hahaa, go out there and enjoy it to the fullest! 
I'm expecting great things from you!
data.name: Sensei

choices.text: Don't put more pressure on me……

data.processed:
<story>Hahaa, go out there and enjoy it to the fullest! 
<story>I'm expecting great things from you!

data.text:
Hearing encouragement from so far away just seemed to put 
more pressure on me. I took a deep breath to calm myself down.
data.processed:
<story>Hearing encouragement from so far away just seemed to put 
<story>more pressure on me. I took a deep breath to calm myself down.

data.text:
Since becoming a pro, and since teaming up with 
Narita Top Road, it's my first race. Considering 
that, anything more than that would……
data.processed:
<story>Since becoming a pro, and since teaming up with 
<story>Narita Top Road, it's my first race. Considering 
<story>that, anything more than that would……

data.text:
Fufuu. I'm getting really motivated. If they're cheering 
that much for me, then I'll have to show them a good run!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu. I'm getting really motivated. If they're cheering 
<story>that much for me, then I'll have to show them a good run!

data.text:
Narita Top Road waved to her friends that came 
to cheer her on with a big smile on her face.

choices.text: Narita Top Road, how can you……

data.processed:
<story>Narita Top Road waved to her friends that came 
<story>to cheer her on with a big smile on her face.

data.text: Yeah?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Yeah?

data.text: Eh……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Eh……

data.text:
I had said that out loud without thinking. There was 
already overwhelming pressure on her from so many 
expectations but I might have added another burden.
data.processed:
<story>I had said that out loud without thinking. There was 
<story>already overwhelming pressure on her from so many 
<story>expectations but I might have added another burden.

data.text:
I was able to keep myself from saying anything more. 
As a trainer, that wasn't the right way to ask her.
data.processed:
<story>I was able to keep myself from saying anything more. 
<story>As a trainer, that wasn't the right way to ask her.

data.text:
No matter how much pressure I was feeling, 
passing on that uneasiness to Narita Top Road was――
data.processed:
<story>No matter how much pressure I was feeling, 
<story>passing on that uneasiness to Narita Top Road was――

data.text: I'm completely fine! Besides, I'm happy!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>I'm completely fine! Besides, I'm happy!

data.text:
I think that expectations are like a 
piece of someone's dreams and wishes.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>I think that expectations are like a 
<story>piece of someone's dreams and wishes.

data.text:
That they're entrusting their dreams, their 
wishes, their feelings to someone……believing 
that they'll be shown a wonderful scene.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>That they're entrusting their dreams, their 
<story>wishes, their feelings to someone……believing 
<story>that they'll be shown a wonderful scene.

data.text:
That they're entrusting something that important, 
to me……that's something amazing, right?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>That they're entrusting something that important, 
<story>to me……that's something amazing, right?

data.text:
――I had never thought of it that way. 
I could feel Narita Top Road's words stir within me.
data.processed:
<story>――I had never thought of it that way. 
<story>I could feel Narita Top Road's words stir within me.

data.text: Trainer-san.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san.

data.text: Will you try having expectations of me?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Will you try having expectations of me?

data.text:
Right. That I'll win, 
that I'll cross the goal before anyone else.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Right. That I'll win, 
<story>that I'll cross the goal before anyone else.

data.text: Trainer-san's expectations……will become my strength!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san's expectations……will become my strength!

data.text:
――Dazzling. That was the only word that came to mind. 
And once again, that feeling of being drawn to her……
data.processed:
<story>――Dazzling. That was the only word that came to mind. 
<story>And once again, that feeling of being drawn to her……

data.text:
Ah, looks like the mock race is starting, huh. 
I'm heading out, Trainer-san! Make sure you're watching me.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>Ah, looks like the mock race is starting, huh. 
<story>I'm heading out, Trainer-san! Make sure you're watching me.

data.text: The mock race begins! And they're off!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>The mock race begins! And they're off!

data.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa……!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Haa, haa, haa, haa……!

data.text:
(Yeah, looking good……! 
I'll keep this position……and wait for a chance!)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>(Yeah, looking good……! 
<story>I'll keep this position……and wait for a chance!)

data.text: Looking good, looking good, Top Road!
data.name: Classmate Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>Looking good, looking good, Top Road!

data.text: (……cheering. Voices filled with expectations)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>(……cheering. Voices filled with expectations)

data.text: (Are these a burden for Trainer-san?)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>(Are these a burden for Trainer-san?)

data.text:
(Maybe, for Trainer-san, these words don't push 
them forward, they are something to be carried)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>(Maybe, for Trainer-san, these words don't push 
<story>them forward, they are something to be carried)

data.text:
(If that's the case then……I want to help lighten 
that burden. Because, even while carrying 
that burden, they still did their best for me)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>(If that's the case then……I want to help lighten 
<story>that burden. Because, even while carrying 
<story>that burden, they still did their best for me)

data.text:
(Will Trainer-san……have any expectations for me? 
Will they think……that I'll definitely win?)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>(Will Trainer-san……have any expectations for me? 
<story>Will they think……that I'll definitely win?)

data.text:
(……I can't hear Trainer-san's voice. 
I can't hear it, but……)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>(……I can't hear Trainer-san's voice. 
<story>I can't hear it, but……)

data.text:
(But maybe, just maybe……past that corner, 
beyond that……and even further……)
data.name: Narita Top Road

choices.text: Top Road! The goal's so close!!
Top Road! The goal's so close!!

data.processed:
<story>(But maybe, just maybe……past that corner, 
<story>beyond that……and even further……)

data.text: (They're waiting for me……at the goal!!)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>(They're waiting for me……at the goal!!)

data.text:
A voice cried out 『――Do your best, Narita Top Road, 
you can do it, show them the results of your training!』
data.processed:
<story>A voice cried out 『――Do your best, Narita Top Road, 
<story>you can do it, show them the results of your training!』

data.text:
(Trainer-san……! I want to show you…… 
that I can cross the goal first!)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>(Trainer-san……! I want to show you…… 
<story>that I can cross the goal first!)

data.text: I'll live up to……your expectations!!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>I'll live up to……your expectations!!

data.text: Uwaaaaaaaahhh!!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Uwaaaaaaaahhh!!

data.text: And they cross the goaaaaaaal!! First place is――!
data.name: Announcer Uma Musume
data.processed: <story>And they cross the goaaaaaaal!! First place is――!

data.text: I……I pushed too hard……!!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>I……I pushed too hard……!!

data.text:
……things were perfect right up until the halfway point. 
However, even after all that training, she still 
couldn't handle tight corners, unfortunately……
data.processed:
<story>……things were perfect right up until the halfway point. 
<story>However, even after all that training, she still 
<story>couldn't handle tight corners, unfortunately……

data.text:
I'm sorry! Even after all that training……but, but next time! 
I'll practice more! As many times as it takes.
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry! Even after all that training……but, but next time! 
<story>I'll practice more! As many times as it takes.

data.text:
I wasn't able to live up to your expectations this time around, 
but if you give me a little time! Then, I'll be better……!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>I wasn't able to live up to your expectations this time around, 
<story>but if you give me a little time! Then, I'll be better……!

data.text:
I could feel her desperation. 
……But even then.
data.processed:
<story>I could feel her desperation. 
<story>……But even then.

data.text: T-Trainer-san?
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>T-Trainer-san?

data.text:
She seemed to be overflowing with motivation 
and a will to win. Even in this atmosphere…… 
even after losing, she still had this much spirit.
data.processed:
<story>She seemed to be overflowing with motivation 
<story>and a will to win. Even in this atmosphere…… 
<story>even after losing, she still had this much spirit.

data.text: I was frustrated we lost. I was frustrated but……more than that――
data.processed: <story>I was frustrated we lost. I was frustrated but……more than that――

data.text: ! Trainer-san……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>! Trainer-san……

data.text: ……Yeah. I'm really frustrated……but, it was still fun!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>……Yeah. I'm really frustrated……but, it was still fun!

data.text:
Right――I want to see more of her, to have more expectations 
of her. This Uma Musume named Narita Top Road.
data.processed:
<story>Right――I want to see more of her, to have more expectations 
<story>of her. This Uma Musume named Narita Top Road.

data.text:
It wasn't like the pressure was gone. But now, 
that was slowly turning in to the motivation to move forward.

choices.text: I want to run together with you
I want to run together with you

data.processed:
<story>It wasn't like the pressure was gone. But now, 
<story>that was slowly turning in to the motivation to move forward.

data.text: Next time, we'll claim victory.
data.processed: <story>Next time, we'll claim victory.

data.text: Trainer-san……
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san……

data.text:
Together with Narita Top Road, G1's wouldn't be just a dream. 
With a big dream like that, I couldn't help but look forward to it.
data.processed:
<story>Together with Narita Top Road, G1's wouldn't be just a dream. 
<story>With a big dream like that, I couldn't help but look forward to it.

data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>! G1……

data.text:
(……If I'm able to give Trainer-san 
their first G1 victory……What kind of……)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>(……If I'm able to give Trainer-san 
<story>their first G1 victory……What kind of……)

data.text: (Smile would they show me?)
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed: <story>(Smile would they show me?)

data.text:
……Yeah! I'll do alot of training! 
I'll overcome my weaknesses, build up strength, and then……!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>……Yeah! I'll do alot of training! 
<story>I'll overcome my weaknesses, build up strength, and then……!

data.text:
I'll definitely win a G1! 
Well……I'll win! I'm looking forward to this!
data.name: Narita Top Road
data.processed:
<story>I'll definitely win a G1! 
<story>Well……I'll win! I'm looking forward to this!
